title: Heavenly Divine Secrets - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Artifacts   Battle Academy   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Male Protagonist   Martial Spirits   Mysterious Family Background   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong
author: Long Water   Taiyi Shengshui   太一生水
description: A drop of magical blood, shatters mountains and rivers. A scroll of ancient scriptures, destroys the cycle of the sun and moon. A book of heavenly arts can bury all those under heaven. Yang Qing Xuan received a divine inheritance, cultivated a technique incomparable to none and crushed countless geniuses of the age on his long eternal road to immortality! “All along, I use my virtue to get others to submit to me. Those who don’t submit are all dead!”>
